text: On 24 February 2015, a mass shooting happened at the restaurant in the town of Uherský Brod, Czech Republic. The gunman, 63-year-old Zdeněk Kovář, killed eight people and injured another. He was in the restaurant for around two hours ( 12:30 p.m.–14:23 p.m.) before the tactical team went into the building. After they entered the building, the gunman committed suicide (killed himself). ==References== Category:2015 murders in Europe Category:2015 mass shootings in Europe Category:History of the Czech Republic Category:February 2015 events Category:Mass murder in 2015 Category:Mass murder in Europe Category:Murder-suicides in Europe Category:Murders by firearm in Europe Category:Zlín Region
title: Uherský Brod shooting
